SEARCH
Package com.kanbine.backend.mappers

Interface UserMapper

public interface UserMapper
Mapper interface for converting between User entities and DTOs. Provides mapping methods to convert UserRequest to User, and User to UserResponse.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final UserMapper
    INSTANCE
     

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default Long
    mapAssignmentToId(Assignment assignment)
    Maps an Assignment entity to its ID.
    User
    toUser(UserRequest userRequest)
    Converts a UserRequest DTO to a User entity.
    UserResponse
    toUserResponse(User user)
    Converts a User entity to a UserResponse DTO.

  • Field Details

    • INSTANCE

      static final UserMapper INSTANCE

  • Method Details

    • toUserResponse

      UserResponse toUserResponse(User user)
      Converts a User entity to a UserResponse DTO. Maps the list of assignments to their corresponding IDs.
      Parameters:
      user - the User entity.
      Returns:
      the corresponding UserResponse DTO.

    • toUser

      User toUser(UserRequest userRequest)
      Converts a UserRequest DTO to a User entity. Ignores the assignments and timeCards fields during the mapping.
      Parameters:
      userRequest - the DTO containing user details.
      Returns:
      the corresponding User entity.

    • mapAssignmentToId

      default Long mapAssignmentToId(Assignment assignment)
      Maps an Assignment entity to its ID. This method is used internally by MapStruct during the mapping process.
      Parameters:
      assignment - the Assignment entity.
      Returns:
      the ID of the Assignment.
